item.title: Arxiv Daily | Apr 2021
item.description: 这篇博客记录的是 2021 年 4 月内刷到的 Arxiv cs.CL 感兴趣的文献。 12 Apr 21 – 13 Apr 21 更新于 16 Apr 2021 Evaluating Saliency Methods for Neural Language Models Author: Shuoyang Ding, Philipp Koehn Comments: NAACL 2021 ​ Relational world knowledge representation in contextual language models: A review Author: Tara Safavi, Danai Koutra ​ Targeted Adversarial Training for Natural Language Understanding Author: Lis Pereira, Xiaodong Liu, Hao Cheng, Hoifung Poon, Jianfeng Gao, Ichiro Kobayashi Comments: NAACL 2021 The key idea is to introspect current mistakes and prioritize adversarial training steps to where the model errs the most.

item.title: Arxiv Daily | Mar 2021
item.description: 这篇博客记录的是 2021 年 3 月内刷到的 Arxiv cs.CL 感兴趣的文献。 31 Mar 21 – 1 Apr 21 更新于 3 Apr 2021 Zero-Shot Language Transfer vs Iterative Back Translation for Unsupervised Machine Translation Author: Aviral Joshi, Chengzhi Huang, Har Simrat Singh This work focuses on comparing different solutions for machine translation on low resource language pairs, namely, with zero-shot transfer learning and unsupervised machine translation. ​ Integrating Subgraph-aware Relation and DirectionReasoning for Question Answering

item.title: Arxiv Daily | Feb 2021
item.description: 这篇博客记录的是 2021 年 2 月内刷到的 Arxiv cs.CL 感兴趣的文献。 26 Feb 21 – 1 Mar 21 更新于 23 Mar 2021 Learning Reasoning Paths over Semantic Graphs for Video-grounded Dialogues Author: Hung Le, Nancy F. Chen, Steven C.H. Hoi Comments: ICLR 2021 ​ OmniNet: Omnidirectional Representations from Transformers Author: Yi Tay, Mostafa Dehghani, Vamsi Aribandi, Jai Gupta, Philip Pham, Zhen Qin, Dara Bahri, Da-Cheng Juan, Donald Metzler ​

item.title: Arxiv Daily | Jan 2021
item.description: 这篇博客记录的是 2021 年 1 月内刷到的 Arxiv cs.CL 感兴趣的文献。 29 Jan 21 – 1 Feb 21 更新于 22 Feb 2021 Hierarchical Ranking for Answer Selection Author: Hang Gao, Mengting Hu, Renhong Cheng, Tiegang Gao ​ Multilingual LAMA: Investigating Knowledge in Multilingual Pretrained Language Models Author: Nora Kassner, Philipp Dufter, Hinrich Schütze Comments: EACL 2021 ‘Working with mBERT, we investigate three questions. (i) Can mBERT be used as a multilingual knowledge base?

item.title: Arxiv Daily | Dec 2020
item.description: 这篇博客记录的是 2020 年 12 月内刷到的 Arxiv cs.CL 感兴趣的文献。 28 Dec 20 – 31 Dec 20 更新于 11 Jan 2021 Robust Dialogue Utterance Rewriting as Sequence Tagging Author: Jie Hao, Linfeng Song, Liwei Wang, Kun Xu, Zhaopeng Tu, Dong Yu dialogue utterance rewriting: The task aims to reconstruct the latest dialogue utterance into a new utterance that is semantically equivalent to the original one and can be understood without referring to the context.

item.title: Arxiv Daily | Nov 2020
item.description: 这篇博客记录的是 2020 年 11 月内刷到的 Arxiv cs.CL 感兴趣的文献。 27 Nov 20 – 30 Nov 20 更新于 2 Dec 2020 Latent Template Induction with Gumbel-CRFs Author: Yao Fu, Chuanqi Tan, Bin Bi, Mosha Chen, Yansong Feng, Alexander M. Rush Comments: NeurIPS 2020 ​ Generative Pre-training for Paraphrase Generation by Representing and Predicting Spans in Exemplars Author: Tien-Cuong Bui, Van-Duc Le, Hai-Thien To, Sang Kyun Cha Comments: IEEE International Conference on Big Data and Smart Computing 2021 Keywords: masking, predicting ​
